ThingDef.label: Advanced Nullifier
ThingDef.description: An advanced variant of the Xenotype Nullifier. This device is a self-contained aerosol, which when sprayed on the skin of a person, begins the gene reversion process. Unlike a standard nullifier, the simplicity of the application means the Advanced Nullifier can be used on any target, including hostile. The target will drop into a coma for 3 days. Using the nullifier on a colonist suffering from the coma will have no effect.
